00029 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 bool DoorDialog::Initialize() {
00031         if (!m_image.Initialize(doc))
00032                 return false;
00033         if (m_doorType == DOORS_INTEREST_REGION || m_doorType == DOORS_INTEREST_BOUNDARY || m_doorType == DOORS_COUNTER) {
00034                 // create interest region mask
00035                 cvZero(door_mask);
00036                 Rasterize(door_mask, cvScalar(1));
00037         }
00038         return true;
00039 }
00040 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 void DoorDialog::DeInitialize() {
00042         m_doorType = DOORS_UNIFORM;
00043         nInVertices = 0;
00044         door.RemoveAll();
00045 }
00046 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 BOOL DoorDialog::OnSetActive() {
00048         CPropertyPage::OnSetActive();
00049         return m_image.Initialize(doc);
00050 }
00051 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 void DoorDialog::DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX)
00053 {
00054         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_DOORIMAGE, m_image);
00055         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_DOOR_SCROLLBAR1, m_vbar);
00056         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_DOOR_SCROLLBAR2, m_hbar);
00057         DDX_Radio(pDX, IDC_DOORS_UNIFORM, m_doorType);
00058         Invalidate();
00059         UpdateWindow();
00060 }
00061 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 void DoorDialog::OnVScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, CScrollBar* pScrollBar) 
00063 {
00064         int curpos = pScrollBar->GetScrollPos();
00065         int minpos;
00066         int maxpos;
00067         pScrollBar->GetScrollRange(&minpos, &maxpos);
00068         SCROLLINFO   info;
00069     pScrollBar->GetScrollInfo(&info, SIF_ALL);
00070         switch (nSBCode)
00071     {
00072                 case SB_TOP:      
00073                         curpos = minpos;
00074                         break;
00075                 case SB_BOTTOM:     
00076                         curpos = maxpos;
00077                         break;
00078                 case SB_ENDSCROLL: 
00079                         break;
00080                 case SB_LINEUP:      
00081                         if (curpos > minpos)
00082                                 curpos--;
00083                         break;
00084                 case SB_LINEDOWN:   
00085                         if (curpos < maxpos)
00086                                 curpos++;
00087                         break;
00088                 case SB_PAGEUP:    
00089                         curpos = max(minpos, curpos - (int) info.nPage);
00090                         break;
00091                 case SB_PAGEDOWN:
00092                         curpos = min(maxpos, curpos + (int) info.nPage);
00093                         break;
00094                 case SB_THUMBPOSITION: 
00095                         curpos = nPos;     
00096                         break;
00097                 case SB_THUMBTRACK:
00098                         curpos = nPos;     
00099                         break;
00100     }    
00101         offsety = curpos;
00102         pScrollBar->SetScrollPos(curpos);
00103         m_image.Invalidate();
00104     CDialog::OnVScroll(nSBCode, nPos, pScrollBar);
00105 }

00107 void DoorDialog::OnHScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, CScrollBar* pScrollBar) 
00108 {
00109         int curpos = pScrollBar->GetScrollPos();
00110         int minpos;
00111         int maxpos;

00114     pScrollBar->GetScrollInfo(&info, SIF_ALL);
00115         switch (nSBCode)
00116     {
00117                 case SB_LEFT:      
00118                         curpos = minpos;
00119                         break;
00120                 case SB_RIGHT:     
00121                         curpos = maxpos;
00122                         break;
00123                 case SB_ENDSCROLL: 
00124                         break;
00125                 case SB_LINELEFT:      
00126                         if (curpos > minpos)
00127                                 curpos--;
00128                         break;
00129                 case SB_LINERIGHT:   
00130                         if (curpos < maxpos)
00131                                 curpos++;
00132                         break;
00133                 case SB_PAGELEFT:    
00134                         curpos = max(minpos, curpos - (int) info.nPage);
00135                         break;
00136                 case SB_PAGERIGHT:
00137                         curpos = min(maxpos, curpos + (int) info.nPage);
00138                         break;
00139                 case SB_THUMBPOSITION: 
00140                         curpos = nPos;     
00141                         break;
00142                 case SB_THUMBTRACK:
00143                         curpos = nPos;     
00144                         break;
00145     }    
00146         offsetx = curpos; 
00147         pScrollBar->SetScrollPos(curpos);
00148         m_image.Invalidate();
00149         CDialog::OnHScroll(nSBCode, nPos, pScrollBar);

00169 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00170 bool CDoorControl::Initialize(CNewVisionDoc* doc) {
00171         // Get first frame from file or camera
00172         image.CopyOf(imgFrame);
00173         // Show scroll bars
00174         if (m_hWnd) {
00175                 DoorDialog* tab = (DoorDialog*)GetParent();
00176                 CRect r; this->GetWindowRect(&r);
00177                 SCROLLINFO horz;
00178                 horz.cbSize = sizeof(SCROLLINFO);
00179                 horz.fMask = SIF_ALL;
00180                 horz.nPage = 50;
00181                 horz.nMin = 0;
00182                 horz.nMax = image.Width()-r.Width()+horz.nPage;
00183                 horz.nPos = 0;
00184                 horz.nTrackPos = 0;
00185                 tab->m_hbar.SetScrollInfo(&horz);
00186                 SCROLLINFO vert;
00187                 vert.cbSize = sizeof(SCROLLINFO);
00188                 vert.fMask = SIF_ALL;
00189                 vert.nPage = 50;
00190                 vert.nMin = 0;
00191                 vert.nMax = image.Height()-r.Height()+vert.nPage;
00192                 vert.nPos = 0;
00193                 vert.nTrackPos = 0;
00194                 tab->m_vbar.SetScrollInfo(&vert);
00195                 tab->m_vbar.ShowWindow(true);  //Hide Vertical Scroll Bar
00196                 tab->m_hbar.ShowWindow(true);  //Hide Horizontal Scroll Bar
00197                 tab->offsetx = 0; tab->offsety = 0;
00198                 this->Invalidate();
00199         }
00200         return true;
00201 }
00202 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00203 void CDoorControl::OnLButtonDown(UINT nFlags, CPoint point)
00204 {
00205         CWnd::OnLButtonDown(nFlags, point);
00206         DoorDialog* tab = ((DoorDialog*)this->GetParent());
00207         CPoint off = CPoint(tab->m_hbar.GetScrollPos(), tab->m_vbar.GetScrollPos());
00208         int match = PointInDot(point+off);
00209         if (match != -1) {
00210                 m_current = match;
00211         }
00212         else {
00213                 CvPoint3D32f newDoor = tab->doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(cvPoint2D32f(point.x+off.x, point.y+off.y));
00214                 if (nFlags & MK_CONTROL) {
00215                         tab->door.Add(cvPoint2D32f(newDoor.x, newDoor.y));
00216                         m_current = tab->door.GetCount()-1;
00217                 }
00218                 else {
00219                         tab->door.InsertAt(tab->nInVertices, cvPoint2D32f(newDoor.x, newDoor.y));
00220                         m_current = tab->nInVertices++;
00221                 }
00222         }
00223         Invalidate();
00224         UpdateWindow();
00225 }
00226 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00227 void CDoorControl::OnMouseMove(UINT nFlags, CPoint point)
00228 {
00229         CWnd::OnMouseMove(nFlags, point);
00230         if (m_current != -1 && (nFlags & MK_LBUTTON)) {
00231                 DoorDialog* tab = (DoorDialog*)GetParent();
00232                 CPoint off = CPoint(tab->m_hbar.GetScrollPos(), tab->m_vbar.GetScrollPos());
00233                 CvPoint3D32f newDoor = tab->doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(cvPoint2D32f(point.x+off.x, point.y+off.y));
00234                 tab->door[m_current] = cvPoint2D32f(newDoor.x, newDoor.y);
00235                 Invalidate();
00236                 UpdateWindow();
00237         }
00238 }
00239 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00240 void CDoorControl::OnLButtonUp(UINT nFlags, CPoint point)
00241 {
00242         CWnd::OnLButtonUp(nFlags, point);
00243         m_current = -1;
00244         Invalidate();
00245         UpdateWindow();
00246 }
00247 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00248 void CDoorControl::OnKeyDown(UINT nChar, UINT nRepCnt,  UINT nFlags) {
00249         CWnd::OnKeyDown(nChar, nRepCnt, nFlags);
00250         if (nChar == VK_DELETE && m_current != -1) {
00251                 DoorDialog* tab = (DoorDialog*)GetParent();
00252                 tab->door.RemoveAt(m_current);
00253                 m_current = -1;
00254                 Invalidate();
00255                 UpdateWindow();
00256         }
00257 }
00258 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00259 int CDoorControl::PointInDot(CPoint point) {
00260         DoorDialog* tab = (DoorDialog*)GetParent();
00261         for (int i=0;i<tab->door.GetCount();i++) {
00262                 CvPoint2D32f p2 = tab->doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(cvPoint3D32f(tab->door[i].x, tab->door[i].y, 0));
00263                 if(d(cvPointFrom32f(p2), cvPoint(point)) <= tab->DOT) {
00264             Invalidate();
00265                         UpdateWindow();
00266                         return i; // return the index of the match found
00267                 }
00268         }
00269         return -1; // no match found
00270 }
00271 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00272 void CDoorControl::DrawItem(LPDRAWITEMSTRUCT lpDrawItemStruct) {
00273         CDC* pDC = CDC::FromHandle(lpDrawItemStruct->hDC);
00274         DoorDialog* dlg=((DoorDialog*)this->GetParent());
00275         image.Show(pDC->m_hDC, 0, 0, image.Width(), image.Height(), dlg->offsetx, dlg->offsety);
00276         dlg->DrawFrame(pDC, CPoint(dlg->offsetx, dlg->offsety));
00277 }
